title: Footstool, 1880–85
provenance: From the estate of Miss Sarah B. Russell
creditline: Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell
description: A) Rectangular wooden stool on bun feet, with hinged frame, covered with blue printed wool, mounted with upholstery nails. B) Rectangular tin container, fitting inside stool.

tombstone.epitaph:
Footstool, 1880–85.
1880–85. Wood, wool, tin. Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell. 1956-42-87-a,b.
